    • Defined in modules/asset.ts:377

    Withdraw from asset pools. https://docs.decent.ch/developer/classgraphene_1_1wallet_1_1detail_1_1wallet__api__impl.html#ac812b96ccef7f81ca97ebda433d98e63

    Parameters

    • issuer: string

      Issuer's account id in format '1.2.X'. Example '1.2.345'.

    • uiaAmount: number

      Custom asset amount.

    • uiaSymbol: string

      Custom asset symbol.

    • dctAmount: number

      Amount of core DCT asset.

    • privateKey: string

      Issuer's private key to sign the transaction.

    Returns Promise<boolean>

    Value confirming successful transaction broadcasting.

    Parameters

    • symbol: string

    • amountToReserve: number

    • privateKey: string

createMonitoredAsset

  • createMonitoredAsset(issuer: string, symbol: string, precision: number, description: string, feedLifetimeSec: number, minimumFeeds: number, issuerPrivateKey: string): Promise<boolean>
    • Defined in modules/asset.ts:641

    Create monitored asset. NOTE: only miner can create monitored asset. https://docs.decent.ch/developer/classgraphene_1_1wallet_1_1detail_1_1wallet__api__impl.html#a03534abbae12c7aa01ca5afb4ceb9575

    Parameters

    • issuer: string

      Account id of miner who creating monitored asset. In format '1.2.X'. Example '1.2.345'.

    • symbol: string

      Asset symbol of newly created asset. Example 'MONAST'.

    • precision: number

      Number of digits on the right side of decimal point. Value needs to be lower-equal 12.

    • description: string

      Assets's description. Up to 1000 characters.

    • feedLifetimeSec: number

      Time during which is active miners feed proposals valid.

    • minimumFeeds: number

      Minimum number of feed proposals from miners.

    • issuerPrivateKey: string

      Issuer's private key to sign the transaction.

    Returns Promise<boolean>

    Value confirming successful transaction broadcasting.

createUserIssuedAsset

  • createUserIssuedAsset(issuer: string, symbol: string, precision: number, description: string, maxSupply: number, baseExchangeAmount: number, quoteExchangeAmount: number, isExchangeable: boolean, isSupplyFixed: boolean, issuerPrivateKey: string): Promise<boolean>
    • Defined in modules/asset.ts:81

    Create UIA(User Issued Asset). https://docs.decent.ch/developer/classgraphene_1_1wallet_1_1detail_1_1wallet__api__impl.html#a3f5461005ce7d6fb69a8878a6513fe1f

    Parameters

    • issuer: string

      Issuer's account id in format '1.2.X'. Example '1.2.345'.

    • symbol: string

      Symbol of newly created asset. NOTE: Price for create asset is based on number of letters. used in asset symbol.

    • precision: number

      Number of fraction digits for asset.

    • description: string

      Asset description. Maximum length is 1000 chars.

    • maxSupply: number

      The maximum supply of this asset which may exist at any given time

    • baseExchangeAmount: number

      Amount of custom tokens for exchange rate to quoteExchangeAmount DCT tokens.

    • quoteExchangeAmount: number

      Number of DCT tokens for rxchange rate.

    • isExchangeable: boolean
    • isSupplyFixed: boolean

      Set value 'true' to fixate token maxSupply, 'false' for changeable maxSupply value. NOTE: only can be changed from 'false' to 'true'

    • issuerPrivateKey: string

      Private key to sign transaction in WIF(hex) (Wallet Import Format) format.

    Returns Promise<boolean>

    Value confirming successful transaction broadcasting.

fundAssetPools

  • fundAssetPools(fromAccountId: string, uiaAmount: number, uiaSymbol: string, dctAmount: number, privateKey: string): Promise<boolean>
    • Defined in modules/asset.ts:273

    Fund asset pools for asset exchanging. https://docs.decent.ch/developer/classgraphene_1_1wallet_1_1detail_1_1wallet__api__impl.html#ab018196310aaa6118877d219d9749305

    Parameters

    • fromAccountId: string

      Account id of account sending DCT asset. In format '1.2.X'. Example '1.2.345'.s

    • uiaAmount: number

      Amount of custom token to be send to pool.

    • uiaSymbol: string

      Asset symbol of custom token which pool to be funded.

    • dctAmount: number

      Amount of DCT token to be send to pool.

    • privateKey: string

      Account private key used for signing transaction.

    Returns Promise<boolean>

    Value confirming successful transaction broadcasting.

getAsset

  • getAsset(assetId: string, formatAsset?: boolean): Promise<DCoreAssetObject>
    • Defined in modules/asset.ts:429

    Get asset object. https://docs.decent.ch/developer/classgraphene_1_1wallet_1_1detail_1_1wallet__api__impl.html#a012e918ecef1d24b2dee7ef64dca5018

    Parameters

    • assetId: string

      Asset id in format '1.3.X'. Example '1.3.0'.

    • Default value formatAsset: boolean = false

      Optional parameter to convert amounts and fees of DCoreAssetObject from blockchain asset amount format to right precision format of asset. Example: 100000000 => 1 DCT. Default: false.

    Returns Promise<DCoreAssetObject>

    DCoreAssetObject of desired asset.

getAssets

  • getAssets(assetIds: string[], formatAssets?: boolean): Promise<DCoreAssetObject[]>
    • Defined in modules/asset.ts:454

    List of desired assets. https://docs.decent.ch/developer/classgraphene_1_1app_1_1database__api__impl.html#ad88d6aec5d661d7f7c40a83291d78ea8

    Parameters

    • assetIds: string[]

      List of asset ids to get. Example ['1.3.0', '1.3.1']

    • Default value formatAssets: boolean = false

      Optional parameter to convert amounts and fees of DCoreAssetObject from blockchain asset amount format to right precision format of asset. Example: 100000000 => 1 DCT. Default: false.

    Returns Promise<DCoreAssetObject[]>

    DCoreAssetObject of desired asset.

issueAsset

  • issueAsset(assetSymbol: string, amount: number, issueToAccount: string, memo: string, issuerPKey: string): Promise<boolean>
    • Defined in modules/asset.ts:146

    Issue created custom user token to account. https://docs.decent.ch/developer/classgraphene_1_1wallet_1_1detail_1_1wallet__api__impl.html#a995074673211a3a6c4d94cafefd0ad56

    Parameters

    • assetSymbol: string

      Asset symbol of asset to be issued. Example 'DCT'

    • amount: number

      Amount of asset ot be issued

    • issueToAccount: string

      Account id to whom asset will be issued. In format '1.2.X'. Example '1.2.345.

    • memo: string

      Message for asset receiver

    • issuerPKey: string

      Issuer private key for transaction sign

    Returns Promise<boolean>

    Value confirming successful transaction broadcasting.

listAssets

  • listAssets(lowerBoundSymbol: string, limit?: number, formatAssets?: boolean): Promise<AssetObject[]>
    • Defined in modules/asset.ts:50

    List assets available on DCore network. https://docs.decent.ch/developer/classgraphene_1_1app_1_1database__api__impl.html#adaff907a467869849e77c3ac0b8beca8

    Parameters

    • lowerBoundSymbol: string

      Asset symbol to start list with. Example 'DCT'

    • Default value limit: number = 100

      Number of results. Default 100(Max)

    • Default value formatAssets: boolean = false

      Optional parameter to convert amounts and fees of AssetObject from blockchain asset amount format to right precision format of asset. Example: 100000000 => 1 DCT. Default: false.

    Returns Promise<AssetObject[]>

    AssetObject list.
